in: Amelia Mary Earhart (July 24, 1897 – July 2, 1937) was an American aviator. She was the first woman to fly a plane by herself across the Atlantic Ocean.
out: Amelia Mary Earhart ( July 24, 1897 – July 2, 1937) was an American aviator. Amelia Mary Earhart was the first woman to fly a plane by herself across the Atlantic Ocean.
